pages.text: Team up with fellow players to share $(l)Mod Researches!$() $(br2)$(l)/the_vault research_team invite [playername]$(br2)/the_vault research_team accept_invite $(br2)/the_vault research_team leave

Researches will be shared when a research team is started onwards. When joining a research team when you already have a mod unlocked and your research partner does not, it does not grant that mod to the research partner. When you leave a research team, the researched mods while in a team will stay available. $(br2)Research prices are $(l)increased$() per person joining the Research Team.
